DataElement.preferredName: Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Current Administration Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to specify the reason for the current administration of a clinical treatment in which Hematopoietic Stem Cell capable of reconstituting the immune system and blood production (hematopoiesis) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Current Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the current administration of a clinical treatment in which Hematopoietic Stem Cell capable of reconstituting the immune system and blood production (hematopoiesis) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A clinical treatment in which HSC capable of reconstituting the immune system and blood production (hematopoiesis) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another. The donor and recipient may or may not be related. 2005

Concepts.definition: A clinical treatment in which hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:The act of administration.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: released as entered during ISO compliance update
